description: The XML output from the OS API contains extra whitespace, for example in a call to list images with details, the metadata has extra newlines inserted.  This is impolite, even if technically it might not be incorrect.
title: XML from OS API contains extra whitespace

comments.content: The XML output from the OS API contains extra whitespace, for example in a call to list images with details, the metadata has extra newlines inserted.  This is impolite, even if technically it might not be incorrect.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~justin-fathomdb
